sections.heading: market; establishment; regulation
sections.text: A city of the second class shall have the power to purchase, hold, and own grounds for and to erect, establish, and regulate market houses and market places.SourceLaws 1879, ยง 39, VII, p. 201;Laws 1881, c. 24, ยง 1, p. 195;R.S.1913, ยง 5020;C.S.1922, ยง 4189;C.S.1929,
